p: In a more recent in-vitro cell-free experiment, all 12 different strains of influenza A and B viruses (the major circulating serotypes and species causing epidemics) were effectively inactivated by the LPO/H 2O 2/(SCN −/I −) system ( Patel et al., 2018). Considering the strain-independent effect, the authors of the latter study encouraged a pharmaceutical application of the LPO/H 2O 2/(SCN −/I −) system in vivo to contribute to the clearance of influenza virus ( Patel et al., 2018).
